Articles.Content:
Hi everyone. I\'ve been playing around with KSP for about a week now. I feel like a 6 year old again!

When I was a kid my parents took me to the Science Museum in london. As part of their space exhibition they had a very simple rocket simulator. All monochrome green and black, you could set number of stages, fuel load etc and try to get into orbit! Since then I\'ve been wishing for something similar and KSP seems to fit the bill pretty well!

I have just managed a successful Mun landing, assisted by mechjeb since Im a little bit rubbish at killing my speed accross the surface. Hopefully I\'ll be able to get the hang of manual landing before long! Then just work out how to get back to Kerbin reliably!

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Admiral Sordid

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Newbie GoodGuy

All of these silly imitators of the Cap\'n\'s signature greeting...

Anyways, I\'d like to welcome you to the forums, which, as you can see, are pretty friendly and occasionally somewhat silly. Have fun, and may you have many successful missions!

Welcome to ze Kerbal Space Programme Forums.

Discuss what you like, but keep it civil, your food will be coming as soon as I can transport 3D Food objects over the interwebs.
